action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several pixelated shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape, green L-shaped and T-shaped figures, orange L-shaped figures, and pink T-shaped figures.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape, green L-shaped pieces, pink T-shaped pieces, and orange L-shaped pieces. The shapes are scattered and not connected to each other.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains several pixelated shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape, green L-shaped and T-shaped figures, orange L-shaped figures, and pink T-shaped figures.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are any of the shapes in your image overlapping or touching each other?

QUESTION: Is there a pink square shape in your image?

ANSWER: Yes.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
